mapper.select: select rec_id, rec_car_type_id, rec_number, rec_password, rec_photo, rec_name, rec_sex, rec_birthday, rec_palce, rec_id_number, rec_driver_number, rec_car_numer, rec_vehicle_type, rec_start_time, rec_effective_time, rec_order_completion_number from recieve_user where rec_id = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
